Sentomaru

Chapter Info

108

Chapter:

1091

Japanese Title:

戦桃丸

Romanized Title:

Sentōmaru

Viz Title:

Sentomaru

Pages:

19

Release Date:

September 4, 2023

WSJ Issue:

2023 Issue 40

Anime:

Episode 1125 (p. 3-19)
Chapter Chronology
← Previous Next →

Chapter 1091 is titled "Sentomaru".

Contents

  • 1 Cover Page
  • 2 Short Summary
  • 3 Long Summary
  • 4 Quick References
    • 4.1 Chapter Notes
    • 4.2 Characters
  • 5 Author Comment
  • 6 Arc Navigation

Cover Page[]

Color Spread: The Straw Hat Pirates (minus Robin & Franky) and two flamingos eating pizza.

Short Summary[]

As the Sea Beast Weapons and Pacifista Mark III attacks the Marines, Kizaru defeats Sentomaru to regain control of the Mark III's to deal with the Sea Beast Weapons and uses his powers to head inside Labophase. Lucci makes his move to kill Vegapunk, but Stussy takes the hit and Zoro faces him, while Sanji puts Kaku out of action. As Kizaru arrives where the Thousand Sunny and Vegaforce-01 is, Luffy confronts him.

Long Summary[]

The siege begins as several Marines open fire on the Pacifista, but several ships are overturned and destroyed by the Sea Beast weapons, prompting the Vice Admirals to take action. Dr. Vegapunk is confused that they would attack with Sentomaru on standby, leading the Straw Hats to realize that Kizaru was sent to take him out. Dr. Vegapunk apologizes to Sentomaru for having him face someone so strong and says he would understand if he wants to flee.

Speaking of, Kizaru kicks Sentomaru far away and uses Yasakani no Magatama to fire several light beams, all the while telling him that he should just surrender. Sentomaru runs from his attack as he declares that he gave his word to the Straw Hats to fend him off. He grabs his ax and jumps into the air as Kizaru asks when he became friends with pirates, and Sentomaru responds that he will side with anyone who offers to help Dr. Vegapunk escape safely.

As the two fight, a flashback reveals that Dr. Vegapunk and Borsalino met Sentomaru after he had beaten up some bears that the two were tasked with dealing with. Borsalino figured that Sentomaru was kicked out of the local village as Sentomaru says that he just needs a job that pays well and will allow him to buy as much onigiri as he would like, so Dr. Vegapunk asks Sentomaru to be his bodyguard, which he accepts with glee.

In the present, Kizaru comments on how cute Sentomaru was back then and how he taught him as much as he could to fight, just as Sentomaru hits him with Ashigara Palm. Kizaru endures and blasts Sentomaru to the ground, defeating him. After that Kizaru takes Sentomaru’s command chip and orders the Pacifista to turn on the Sea Beast Weapons and defend the Marines, which they start doing. Saturn witnesses this and tells Kizaru to keep him updated on all casualties.

On the Labophase, everyone witnesses Sentomaru’s defeat, but Dr. Vegapunk, Edison, and Atlas continue to work to take down the Frontier Dome. Dr. Vegapunk also reveals to the Straw Hats that since Kizaru is made of light, he can easily slip past the laser barrier, which he ultimately does. His presence sets off the emergency siren, which alerts Luffy's group as they continue to make way to the back of the island. The Straw Hats try to warn Luffy to speed up, but Rob Lucci makes his move and tries to kill Dr. Vegapunk, only for Stussy to use herself as a shield, taking the blow.

As Stussy collapses to the ground, Sanji grabs a bubble gun and seals Kaku inside as Lucci’s next attack gets blocked by Zoro, who calls him a coward for waiting for backup. Lucci ignores him and tells everyone that now that he and Kizaru are working together, they won’t be leaving the island alive. Zoro simply pushes Lucci out and reminds him not to underestimate them.

Kizaru finds the Vegaforce-01, but is greeted by Luffy, who immediately kicks him as Kizaru blocks. Luffy confidently states that he and his crew are a hundred times stronger than they were two years ago on Sabaody, so this will not be like last time.

Quick References[]

Chapter Notes[]

  • The Marines start fighting the Pacifista Mk. III and Sea Beast Weapons.
  • Kizaru defeats Sentomaru.
    • Kizaru recalls the time he first met Sentomaru, as described in SBS Volume 106, and how he taught him how to fight.
    • With Sentomaru unconscious, Kizaru uses his authority chip to regain control of the Pacifista and orders them to attack the Sea Beasts Weapons.
  • Lucci attempts to assassinate Dr. Vegapunk, but Stussy takes his strike herself instead and collapses.
    • Zoro engages Lucci in battle, and they both launch themselves off the laboratory.
    • Sanji uses Nami's bubble gun to restrain Kaku in seastone.
  • Kizaru crosses the Frontier Dome and reaches the Labophase, where he locates the Vegaforce-01 and the Thousand Sunny trying to move into position for the escape plan.
    • Luffy shows up to confront him.

Author Comment[]


Author Comment
  • Translation
  • Original


The live-action One Piece show is now available! Please watch it! I’ll do my best with the manga too!


実写版ONE PIECEが公開になりましたー！！是非観て！漫画も頑張ります！！

—Eiichiro Oda
English translation by VIZ Media. For comprehensive translation credits, see here.

'''Chapter 1091''' is titled "Sentomaru". 

==Cover Page==
[[Color Spread]]: The [[Straw Hat Pirates]] (minus [[Nico Robin|Robin]] & [[Franky]]) and two flamingos eating pizza.

==Short Summary==
As the [[Sea Beast Weapons]] and [[Pacifista|Pacifista Mark III]] attacks the [[Marines]], [[Borsalino|Kizaru]] defeats [[Sentomaru]] to regain control of the Mark III's to deal with the Sea Beast Weapons and uses his [[Pika Pika no Mi|powers]] to head inside [[Egghead#Labophase|Labophase]]. [[Rob Lucci|Lucci]] makes his move to kill [[Vegapunk]], but [[Stussy]] takes the [[Rokushiki/Shigan|hit]] and [[Roronoa Zoro|Zoro]] faces him, while [[Sanji]] puts [[Kaku]] [[Seastone|out of action]]. As Kizaru arrives where the [[Thousand Sunny]] and [[Vegaforce-01]] is, [[Monkey D. Luffy|Luffy]] confronts him.

==Long Summary==
The siege begins as several [[Marines]] open fire on the [[Pacifista]], but several ships are overturned and destroyed by the [[Sea Beast Weapons|Sea Beast weapons]], prompting the [[Vice Admiral|Vice Admirals]] to take action. [[Vegapunk|Dr. Vegapunk]] is confused that they would attack with [[Sentomaru]] on standby, leading the [[Straw Hat Pirates|Straw Hats]] to realize that [[Borsalino|Kizaru]] was sent to take him out. Dr. Vegapunk apologizes to Sentomaru for having him face someone so strong and says he would understand if he wants to flee.

Speaking of, Kizaru kicks Sentomaru far away and uses '''Yasakani no Magatama''' to fire several light beams, all the while telling him that he should just surrender. Sentomaru runs from his attack as he declares that he gave his word to the Straw Hats to fend him off. He grabs his ax and jumps into the air as Kizaru asks when he became friends with pirates, and Sentomaru responds that he will side with anyone who offers to help Dr. Vegapunk escape safely.

As the two fight, a flashback reveals that Dr. Vegapunk and Borsalino met Sentomaru after he had beaten up some bears that the two were tasked with dealing with. Borsalino figured that Sentomaru was kicked out of the local village as Sentomaru says that he just needs a job that pays well and will allow him to buy as much onigiri as he would like, so Dr. Vegapunk asks Sentomaru to be his bodyguard, which he accepts with glee.

In the present, Kizaru comments on how cute Sentomaru was back then and how he taught him as much as he could to fight, just as Sentomaru hits him with '''Ashigara Palm'''. Kizaru endures and blasts Sentomaru to the ground, defeating him. After that Kizaru takes Sentomaru’s command chip and orders the Pacifista to turn on the Sea Beast Weapons and defend the Marines, which they start doing. [[Jaygarcia Saturn|Saturn]] witnesses this and tells Kizaru to keep him updated on all casualties.

On the Labophase, everyone witnesses Sentomaru’s defeat, but Dr. Vegapunk, [[Vegapunk/Edison|Edison]], and [[Vegapunk/Atlas|Atlas]] continue to work to take down the Frontier Dome. Dr. Vegapunk also reveals to the Straw Hats that since Kizaru is [[Pika Pika no Mi|made of light]], he can easily slip past the laser barrier, which he ultimately does. His presence sets off the emergency siren, which alerts [[Monkey D. Luffy|Luffy]]'s group as they continue to make way to the back of the island. The Straw Hats try to warn Luffy to speed up, but [[Rob Lucci]] makes his move and tries to kill Dr. Vegapunk, only for [[Stussy]] to use herself as a shield, taking the blow.

As Stussy collapses to the ground, [[Sanji]] grabs a bubble gun and seals [[Kaku]] inside as Lucci’s next attack gets blocked by [[Roronoa Zoro|Zoro]], who calls him a coward for waiting for backup. Lucci ignores him and tells everyone that now that he and Kizaru are working together, they won’t be leaving the island alive. Zoro simply pushes Lucci out and reminds him not to underestimate them.

Kizaru finds the [[Vegaforce-01]], but is greeted by Luffy, who immediately kicks him as Kizaru blocks. Luffy confidently states that he and his crew are a hundred times stronger than they were two years ago on [[Sabaody Archipelago|Sabaody]], so this will not be like last time.
